item.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman reveals the secret to identifying real trends vs. fake trends. Here is how you can spot them too
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman explains how to distinguish real tech trends from fads by observing user passion and consistent usage. He cites the iPhone's revolutionary impact versus VR's limited adoption as examples, drawing on his career experience to highlight the…
